t: Crystal Light Lemonade On The Go Drink Mix 10 Sachets 39.6g : Amazon.co.uk: Grocery
s: I discovered Crystal light lemonade when I was working with some Americans about 10 years ago and used to drink litres of it. The sachets are really practical means and carry them in your pocket and just add them to a bottle of water wherever you are. My husband is now a convert and insist on taking a bottle of this on the golf course every week. The flavour really is superb even if they are slightly more expensive than other brands...
